definition[0]: to calculate the total of several numbers
example[0]: I can add up in my head quite easily.
example[1]: Specialized software adds up the statistics.
definition[1]: if a set of facts does not add up, it does not provide a reasonable explanation for a situation
example[2]: He was troubled by a feeling that things just didn’t add up.
definition[2]: if sums, numbers etc do not add up, there is a mistake in them
definition[3]: used to say that lots of small amounts gradually make a large total
example[4]: There are five of us using the phone so it all adds up.
